unnormalised: Aiyo, Adv. Sharma meneda je civil code cetanre, chacha renak property serwa kanuni wariskoh serwa serit́ tahenkate bagioka, ape hoṭonre okoe leka cet́ cin menlekhan o. Toh basically, beta, okiĺ hoy te sange sange sala lepe!
normalised: Aiyyo, Advocate Sharma menket' kana je civil code tala re, chacha renak jaedad serwa hukum heir gitijok' tala re samang te bant'ok', alekha chahae uniak will dohore men. Toh mulrup te, beta, ekjon lawyer sao A-S-A-P!
text: Aiyo, Adv. Sharma meneda je civil code cetanre, chacha renak property serwa kanuni wariskoh serwa serit́ tahenkate bagioka, ape hoṭonre okoe leka cet́ cin menlekhan o. Toh basically, beta, okiĺ hoy te sange sange sala lepe!
